title: Anesthesia Type Distribution and Average Duration Across Cases
description: This chart shows the distribution of anesthesia types and their average durations. Click on a bar to view detailed information.

title: Global Gender Gap in Primary Education
description: This project explores how visualizations reveal or obscure gender gaps in global primary education using world maps and enrollment trend analysis.
